attributes.action: Employ Members of Parliament under the PAYE system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The abuse of the Expenses system is due to lack of control and as an Employee the MP's would be held under a formal contract of employment, subject to the same rules as the people they represent.
They would also be subject to the same tax rules would really understand how taxation works be subject to the same redunduncy terms and could be dismissed for any wrong doing

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
